dmca.title: Takedown of http://css0urce.funpic.de/ and related sites
dmca.body:
Kevin A. Rosenfield
krosenfield@prestongates.com
206-370-6586




June 13, 2007



URGENT/IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED
VIA ELECTRONIC MAIL


The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
1333 Stemmons Freeway - Suite 110
Dallas, TX  75207
+1-214-782-7800  (Office)
abuse@theplanet.com

Re:  DMCA NOTICE OF ALLEGED COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT

Dear The Planet Internet Services:

This letter serves as notification that content currently residing within your computer system infringes on the copyrights of Valve Corporation.  I am an attorney for Valve and am authorized to act on its behalf in this matter.

It has come to our attention that a website on your system currently publishes links to IP addresses and websites unlawfully distributing source code from the beta version of Valve
dmca.principal_name: Preston Gates and Ellis LLP (for Valve Corporation)
